3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with clean geometry and consistent wall thicknesses.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Layout is highly faithful; room adjacencies and wall positions match the blue 2D plan precisely.

interior_elements.notes: Excellent furniture placement; includes laundry appliances, kitchen stove, and bathroom fixtures in correct locations.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering; consistent materials and lighting. Minor subtraction for slight door swing geometry abstraction.

detected_errors.description: Door swing representations in 3D are slightly blocky/unrefined compared to the rest of the mesh.

summary: A highly accurate and geometrically faithful 3D conversion that meticulously captures every room and fixture from the 2D floor plan.
